sqlMap.select: /* TypeStatsMstrDAO.selectListForTypeStatsTree */ SELECT FLD_ID AS id , FLD_NM AS text , CONVERT( BIT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WP2_TYPE_STATS_MSTR WHERE FLD_PARENT_ID = A.FLD_ID) ) AS children , 'typeStats' AS type FROM WP2_TYPE_STATS_MSTR A WHERE FLD_PARENT_ID = #FLD_PARENT_ID# ORDER BY FLD_ORDINAL
